title: Introducing Minimalist CMS
content:
Introducing Minimalist CMS: A Lightweight, No bloat, Database-Free Content Management System.Â 


Open Source & Free Minimalist CMS is completely free and open source. https://github.com/kurt-grung/Minimalist


npm install minimalist
npx minimalist init
npm run dev

Perfect For

  • Personal blogs and portfolios
  • Documentation sites
  • Small business websites
  • Any project that needs content management without database overhead

Built With Modern Tech

Minimalist CMS is built with:

  • JavaScript
  • TypeScript
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Vitest
  • Next.js 16+ supported

Whether you're building a simple blog or a complex multi-lingual site, Minimalist CMS provides the flexibility and simplicity you need.

Give it a try and let me know what you think!
excerpt: A lightweight, file-based headless CMS with no database required. Supports multi-lingual content, REST & GraphQL APIs, and works perfectly with static site generators.
